channel.title: Formula 1 Team on
channel.description: Recent content in Formula 1 Team on

item.title: Grand Prix Tycoon
item.description: Manage your own Formula 1 racing team! After your investor have found 2 million under his sofa, he has decided to invest them on you. Make him pride and build a successful team! For that, you have to hire a driver, a hot grid girl and pit crew, build your race car and race through the whole season of the Grand Prix(GP).
